law.catch_line: The lessor shall disclose in each rental-purchase agreement, as applicable:...

text.section:
A lessor shall place on property which is to be leased as a part of a rental-purchase agreement and is displayed in the lessor's place of business a tag which shall indicate:
The number and amount of individual renewal payments necessary to purchase the property;
The total amount necessary to purchase the property; and
Whether the property is new or used.
